amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Homeless Assistance Grants by $122.6 million; and decrease funding for the Downpayment Assistance Initiative by $100 million and HUD salaries and expenses by $22.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $123 million (by offset) the bill's funding for homeless assistance grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaFalce amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 300 (Roll no. 285).
